page.title: 12WHITE HALL CENTRE COURSES
page.content: The courses offered fall into three categories: a) Open Country Pursuits courses ranging in length from a weekend to eight days,aimed mainly at schools and colleges and youth groups. b)Specialist Activity courses ranging in length from one weekend to eight days.These provide progressive training in climbing,canoeing and caving and hillcraft. c) Leader and instructor coaching courses e.g.,MLC,BCU and RYA courses. There is a permanent instructional staff of five instructors,all of whom are qualified in a number of the activities undertaken at White Hall.
